about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of CORBID! A Colorful Adventure by Guinu. The soundtrack includes the 7 tracks heard during the game.

Guinu is an emerging producer and music composer based in Barcelona.

He began learning music at the age of 7, initially focusing on the piano but later transitioning to the bass guitar. Years later, he explored the realms of electric and classical guitar.

It wasn't until he attended the musicology faculty at the university that he developed an interest in electronic, urban, and pop sounds. Crossing that threshold, he discovered musical production, and there was no turning back.

In recent years, Guinu has studied sound production and gained experience in the sound industry.
Currently, he is passionately pursuing a personal project in his home studio, "La Guineueta," doing what he loves most: music production.

Original soundtrack of CORBID! A Colorful Adventure by Guinu. The soundtrack includes the 7 tracks heard during the game.

Guinu is an emerging producer and music composer based in Barcelona.

He began learning music at the age of 7, initially focusing on the piano but later transitioning to the bass guitar. Years later, he explored the realms of electric and classical guitar.

It wasn't until he attended the musicology faculty at the university that he developed an interest in electronic, urban, and pop sounds. Crossing that threshold, he discovered musical production, and there was no turning back.

In recent years, Guinu has studied sound production and gained experience in the sound industry.
Currently, he is passionately pursuing a personal project in his home studio, "La Guineueta," doing what he loves most: music production.
